about_the_game:
Become a True Supporter - Get an exclusive Dice Design


"A mark of honor, shining with the dedication of those who dare to dream big."

If you simply can't get enough of Dungeon Full Dive then the True Supporter Diceset is for you. Your support fuels further development of the game and gives you this exclusive dice set as an additional bonus (as well as our heartfelt, eternal thanks and gratitude <3)

Flaunt your unique style and show your support with these visually stunning dice. Ideal for collectors and enthusiasts looking to add a touch of exclusivity to their gameplay.

Important note: By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for Dungeon Full Dive and TxK Gaming Studios. The dice set is the icing on the cake!

Available during Early Access only.

short_description: This special pack features uniquely designed digital dice, crafted exclusively for our most dedicated supporters. Ideal for collectors and enthusiasts looking to add a touch of exclusivity to their gameplay.
